Description: TEE H Banking Services - Sales Agent Position - Dubai Why Tee H: • Leadership in Innovation: Pioneering the banking brokerage arena, TEE H is shaping Dubai's financial landscape. • Collaborative Partnerships: Teaming up with the UAE's elite banks, our offerings encompass superior banking solutions. • Empowering Environment: Dive into a fusion of state-of-the-art banking tactics and streamlined sales strategies. • Focused Product Portfolio: Lead the charge in Personal Finance, Home Mortgage, and Credit Cards. • Dedicated Role for Women: We're scouting for spirited female talents eager to be our brand ambassadors. Job Description: • Product Sales: propose Tee H’s extensive banking suite. • Customer Relations: Build and nurture enduring client rapport. • Lead Acquisition: Innovatively scout and secure promising sales leads. • Client Conversion: Engage and win over prospects to join our esteemed banking partners. • Multichannel Outreach: Harness leads through social channels, personal networks, cold calls, and face-to-face engagements. • Sales Targets: Regularly hit and exceed sales benchmarks. • Customer Support: Ensure pristine client service, promptly addressing concerns. • Trend Adaptation: Stay attuned to industry breakthroughs and market dynamics. • Teamwork: Integrate smoothly within the Tee H team, driving collective milestones. Job Specifications: • Job Type: Full-time engagement. • Location: Business Bay - Dubai • Language: arabic (both oral and written) is essential. • Tools Proficiency: Skilled in MS Office and related admin tools. Skills
Skills: • Sales Expertise: Rich sales background, bonus points for banking sector insights.
• Communication Maven: Exemplary communication skills backed by stellar relationship building.
• Negotiation Pro: Proven negotiation talents crowned by a history of successful deals.
• Driven & Adaptive: An intrinsic motivation paired with the adaptation to excel in varied environments.
• Sales Savvy: Updated with the latest sales techniques and industry high standards.
• Educational Qualification: Minimum: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, or related fields.
• Special Consideration: Visa holders, will be offered specials packages.
